titleStmt.title: An excellent and learned treatise of apostasie made by the most reuerend and godly learned man M. Iohn de l'Espine minister of the word of God in the churche of Angers in the dukedome of Anjou. Directed against the apostates in the churches of France. Written first in the French tongue by the author him selfe, and now faithfully translated into English. The contentes of the booke appeare in the page following
Traité de l'apostasie. English.
titleStmt.author: L'Espine, Jean de, ca. 1506-1597.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Vautrollier dwelling in the Black-friers neare Ludgate,
